author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
6 years Ubuntu tried to drop support for multilib or the 32 bit libraries in 19.10 and that went badly, now Fedora Linux is trying to do the same as it's gaining tracking in the gaming space and Linux gamers are not happy.
